steps.title: Welcome to Lagoon!
steps.content: This tour is intended to show you around and give helpful tips on things you can do with lagoon! You will discover guides per page, so feel free to explore. You can always skip the tour

steps.title: View all deployments
steps.content: You can easily access all of your deployments here

steps.title: Personal settings
steps.content: You can access your projects and settings (SSH keys) by clicking this menu

steps.title: The projects page
steps.content: This is the index page of Lagoon, showing projects you have access to, click on any of them to find out more

steps.title: Project Sidebar
steps.content: Each project has a sidebar with useful information

steps.title: Project Environments
steps.content: You can view project routes, specific details, deployments, backups and tasks per environment

steps.title: Overview Tab
steps.content: Detailed overview of the environment you're seeing now

steps.title: Deployments Tab
steps.content: Takes you to the deployments page with logviewer

steps.title: Backups Tab
steps.content: Retrieve and download backups

steps.title: Tasks Tab
steps.content: Execute tasks per environment, or view previously executed ones

steps.title: Start a deployment
steps.content: You can always start a new deployment of the current branch

steps.title: View a previous deployment
steps.content: Or have a look at a previous deployment

steps.title: Deployment details
steps.content: Here you can see general information about your deployment

steps.title: Deployment logs
steps.content: And with the logviewer, you can see individual deployment steps by expanding them

steps.title: Navigating
steps.content: You can always navigate by clicking on the breadcrumbs

steps.title: Downloading a backup
steps.content: You can retrieve and download the backup by clicking here

steps.title: Running a task
steps.content: Select and run a task from here

steps.title: Viewing a task
steps.content: Or view a previously ran task by clicking here

steps.title: Task logs
steps.content: Raw task logs

steps.title: Navigating
steps.content: You can always navigate back by clicking on the breadcrumbs

steps.title: All deployments
steps.content: This is where you have all your deployments

steps.title: Deployment detail
steps.content: Click on an individual deployment name to know more details
